issue.title: Python: Add Column and Table wrapper interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-49](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-49). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Per `arrow::Column` and `arrow::Table`. This will be the target data structure for most `pandas.DataFrame`-like data

comments.body:
